## Migrate results for datasets simulated with a growth phase 10,000 generations in the past

### Replicate 1 of mtDNA panmixia with Ne=1,000,000
```{r mtdna_panmixia, echo=F}
wd<-"/Users/eric/Datasets/simulations/ibdsim/migrate_mtdna_singlepop1"
bflist_singlepop<-list()
for(rep in 1:10){
  wd2<-file.path(wd,paste("simrep",rep,sep=""))
  marglikes<-migrate_harvester(wd=wd2,models=models,multilocus = F,quiet = T)
  bftable<-lapply(marglikes,bfcalcs,ml="bezier.corrected")
  bfsum2<-bfcalcs_reps(bftable, models=models, reps=2) 
  bflist_singlepop[rep]<-bfsum2[1]
  print("Final Result - 2 reps") 
  print(rep)
  print(bfsum2)
}
```

### Taking the means of the model probabilities across replicates

```{r modelprobs, echo=F}

finalprobs<-data.frame(models)
for(sim in ls(pattern="bflist")){
  # this takes each of those lists and gets the model probabilities out for each model
  probs<-matrix(as.numeric(laply(get(sim), as.matrix)[,,7]),nrow=10)
  # take the mean model probability for each model
  probs2<-data.frame(apply(probs,2,mean))
  finalprobs<-cbind(finalprobs,probs2)
}
names(finalprobs)<-c("models",ls(pattern="bflist"))

longprobs<-melt(finalprobs,id.vars = "models",variable.name = "Simulation",value.name="Model Probability")

longprobs$models<-factor(longprobs$models, levels=models)

longprobs$Simulation<-factor(longprobs$Simulation, levels=c("bflist_g10k_nl4_m0.01","bflist_g10k_nl5_m0.001","bflist_g10k_nl6_m0.0001","bflist_g10k_nl4_m0.1","bflist_g10k_nl5_m0.01","bflist_g10k_nl6_m0.001","bflist_singlepop"),labels=c("Ne = 10,000\nm = 0.01","Ne = 100,000\nm = 0.001","Ne = 1,000,000\nm = 0.0001","Ne = 10,000\nm = 0.1","Ne = 100,000\nm=0.01","Ne = 1,000,000\nm = 0.001","Ne = 1,000,000\nPanmixia"))

my.cols<-brewer.pal(7,"RdYlBu")
my.cols[7]<-"#7f7f7f"
ggplot(data=longprobs,aes(x=Simulation,y=`Model Probability`)) + geom_bar(stat="identity",aes(fill=models)) + scale_fill_manual(values = my.cols, labels=c("k=10 Stepping-Stone, 28 parameter","k=5 Stepping-Stone, 13 parameter","k=10 Stepping-Stone, 2 parameter","k=5 Stepping-Stone, 2 parameter","k=10 Island, 2 parameter","k=5 Island, 2 parameter","k=1 Panmixia"),guide = guide_legend(title = "Migrate Models")) + theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(), legend.text=element_text(size=15), legend.title=element_text(size=18), axis.text.y=element_text(size=14), axis.title.y=element_text(size=14))

```
